```{r load_code}
library(tidyverse, warn.conflicts = F)
library(rvest)
library(plotly)
library(cluster)
library(ggdendro)

personagens = read_csv(file = "../dados/film-dialogue/character_list5.csv")
personagens = personagens %>% filter(age != 'NULL') %>% mutate(age = as.numeric(age))

filmes = read_csv(file = "../dados/film-dialogue/meta_data7.csv")
filmes = filmes %>% filter(gross != 'NA')

no = read_csv("../dados/film-dialogue/character_mapping.csv")

filmes_personagens = merge(filmes, personagens, by="script_id")
```
